Summary: I SAW A V SHAPED OUT MY WINDOW WITH BLINDING LIGHT
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Romeo
There were no other sightings in Romeo on or around July 13th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI HAD GOTTON INTO MY BEAD MY LITTLE BROTHER WAS ALREADY SLEAPING AND MY OTHERWAS IN THE BATHROOM,AND I WAS LOOKING IN TO MY HALL WHEN I TURNED TO MY WINDOWWHERE I SAW A HUGE V TRIANGULAR TRAINGULAR SHAPE I COUDENT SEE THE TOP BECAUSEIT WS SO DARK OUTSIDE THERE WAS BLUE AND PURPLE LIGHTS ON IT I LOOKED AT IT FORABOUT 30 SECODS THEN IT WENT BEHIND A TREE LINE AND THATS THE LAST I SAW OF IT
